name: Circuit vs Invoice
query:
SELECT
    si.name AS "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:150",
    si.posting_date AS "Invoice Date:Date:120",
    si.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    si.custom_invoice_mode AS "Invoice Mode:Data:120",
    si.custom_sales_order AS "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:150",
    si.custom_order_type AS "Order Type:Data:120",
    si.custom_start_date AS "Start Date:Date:120",
    si.custom_end_date AS "End Date:Date:120",

    sii.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit:Data:150",
    sii.custom_site_info AS "Site Name:Data:200",
    sii.custom_solution AS "Solution:Data:150",
    sii.item_name AS "Item:Data:200",
    sii.rate AS "Rate:Currency:120",
    sii.qty AS "Qty:Float:100",
    sii.amount AS "Amount:Currency:120"

FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sii
    ON si.name = sii.parent
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1   -- ✅ Only submitted invoices
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC,
    si.name;
